Posts.EditableText:
I made a simple change to the description of and added a few alternate names to an item in the first room.  Now the object does not show up in the room description and I don't know why.  The item is needed to solve the very first puzzle of the game. 

Please help me figure out what I mucked up?  I made the changes on the browser editor.  I have since got a new computer and can work again on the desktop version.  I had a look at it on both platforms and can't see my error.  I've attached the game file.
Posts.HTML:
I made a simple change to the description of and added a few alternate names to an item in the first room. Now the object does not show up in the room description and I don't know why. The item is needed to solve the very first puzzle of the game.

Please help me figure out what I mucked up? I made the changes on the browser editor. I have since got a new computer and can work again on the desktop version. I had a look at it on both platforms and can't see my error. I've attached the game file.
Wake Up.aslx

Posts.EditableText: It's been marked "scenery" somehow. Take that out!
Posts.HTML: It's been marked "scenery" somehow. Take that out!

Posts.EditableText: Well, now I feel right stupid.  Thanks, I've fixed it.
Posts.HTML: Well, now I feel right stupid.  Thanks, I've fixed it.
